diff_act: 5.establish relationships between the document and Entities

regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the user to name the document before saving it with its Entity connections intact for future retrieval.
The system shall provide a feature for the user to name the document before saving it with its Entity connections.
The system shall allow users to assign a name to the document before saving it with its Entity connections.

label: The user may optionally specify a descriptive name for the document.
